isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ 5 Engine Service Manual - Fuel System - Removal - Fuel Injector Assemblies

step1.para: Remove valve covers. See "Cylinder Head and Valve Train".
Remove high-pressure oil manifolds. See "High-pressure Oil System".

figure.caption: Releasing the injector connector from rocker arm carrier

calloutgroup.callout1: Injector Connector Remover tool with handle (cylinders 1, 2, 6)
Injector Connector Remover tool without handle (cylinders 3, 5)
Injector Connector Remover tool without handle (cylinder 4)

note.para: Injector connector removal procedures are based on the engine being out-of-chassis.
There is no need to drain fuel rail when removing an injector.

step1.para: Disconnect injector harness from the injector connector.
Release injector connectors using Injector Connector Remover .

note.para: On some connectors remove the tool handle, fit the remover portion onto connector and use a screwdriver or other tool to push down and release connector.

step1.para: Push down on the injector connector to release it from the rocker arm carrier.

figure.caption: Fuel injector hold down clamp removal

note.para: Fuel injectors are self extracting and come out of injector bores as injector hold down clamp bolt is loosened.

step1.para: Loosen each fuel injector hold down clamp bolt using a T45 Torx bit socket .

figure.caption: Fuel injector removal from cylinder head

calloutgroup.callout1: Fuel injector hold down clamp assembly

step1.para: Remove fuel injector from cylinder head bore by lifting injector and hold down clamp assembly up and out.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not clean injectors with parts solvent or other chemicals.

step1.para: Remove and discard injector upper and lower O-rings and nozzle gasket with a non-metalic hand tool.

note.para: If nozzle gasket is missing from any injector removed, look for gasket at the bottom of its injector bore. Remove and discard all nozzle gaskets.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, when injectors are removed from the engine, place injectors in a closeable container, cover with clean engine oil, and close container.

step1.para: Remove each fuel injector assembly, place in a closeable container, cover with clean engine oil, and close container.
If removing or replacing any of the injectors and not the sleeves, clean injector sleeve with Injector Sleeve Brush .
